profile.profileDescription: A system that integrates archival, library and museum collection items and workflows

label.name_singular: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC: Sorenson AVC Pro codec
label.name_plural: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC: Sorenson AVC Pro codec

label.name_singular: Direct Stream Transfer (DST): MPEG-4 DST reference software
label.name_plural: Direct Stream Transfer (DST): MPEG-4 DST reference software

label.name_singular: DTS Coherent Acoustics (DTS, Digital Theatre System Coherent Acoustics)
label.name_plural: DTS Coherent Acoustics (DTS, Digital Theatre System Coherent Acoustics)

label.name_singular: MPEG-4: Harmonic and Individual Lines and Noise (HILN)
label.name_plural: MPEG-4: Harmonic and Individual Lines and Noise (HILN)

label.name_singular: RALCWI (Robust Advanced Low Complexity Waveform Interpolation)
label.name_plural: RALCWI (Robust Advanced Low Complexity Waveform Interpolation)

label.name_singular: RTAudio - used by Microsoft Live Communication Server
label.name_plural: RTAudio - used by Microsoft Live Communication Server

label.name_singular: Polyester Urethane Foam (Ester Foam): 1.7 lb Density
label.name_plural: Polyester Urethane Foam (Ester Foam): 1.7 lb Density

label.name_singular: Polyethalene Foam (Etha Foam): 1, 2, 4, and 6 lb. Densities
label.name_plural: Polyethalene Foam (Etha Foam): 1, 2, 4, and 6 lb. Densities

label.name_singular: 2 x 4 (Cushioned with Volara, Etha Foam or Ester Foam)
label.name_plural: 2 x 4 (Cushioned with Volara, Etha Foam or Ester Foam)

label.name_singular: Problems of Auxiliary Elements (Stretcher, Cradle, Lining)
label.name_plural: Problems of Auxiliary Elements (Stretcher, Cradle, Lining)

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this item. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Library of Congress Names Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Geographic Areas Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject Headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Genre/Forms File
label.description: Library of Congress Genre/Forms describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Source
label.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of Object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of Object

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of Object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of Object

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Weight
label.description: Weight of Object

label.name: Exhibition History
label.description: Use the following format: Exhibition Title. Exhibition Venue, City, Dates.

label.name: Current Insurance Value
label.description:
Use symbols or the following 3-letter codes:

US Dollar: USD
Euro: EUR
Canadian Dollar: CAD

Chinese Yuan Renminbi: CNY
Hong Kong Dollar: HKD
Japanese Yen: JPY
Korean Won: KPW
Mexican Peso: MXN
Pound Sterling: GBP
Qatari Rial: QAR
Russian Ruble: RUB
Saudi Riyal: SAR
Swiss Franc: CHF
